author: Shahar Avigezer
contents: As a strong believer in the idea that a new job means new habits, I’m always looking for ways to improve my workflow and boost productivity. In this post, I’ll be sharing 3 new tools that I’ve started using and highlighting the features that I like most. So, if you’re looking for some new tools to add to your developer toolkit, read on!
title: 3 New Dev Tools I Picked Up and What I Like Most About Them

author: Shahar Avigezer
contents: “Losing your job can be a tough time, and it’s not uncommon to feel lonely and uncertain. In this blog post, I share my own experience of being laid off and how I coped with it. I’ll add some tips that can help with the emotional and practical aspects of job loss. Whether you’re currently going through a layoff or just want to be prepared for the future, this post is for you.
title: Bouncing Back from Layoff: How I Coped and Found a New Way Forward

title: About Me
